ing: 1 pound fresh okra, sliced in 1/8 inch pieces
des: "Just saute okra with onions and turmeric, and you've got a delicious side dish in minutes."
ins: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat and saute onion until translucent.  Stir in okra and turmeric.  Reduce heat to low and cook 15 minutes, or until tender.
